snippet: Jeremy Lin will be the fourth player to start at point guard this season for the Knicks, who have lacked a consistent playmaker.
abstract: Jeremy Lin will be the fourth player to start at point guard this season for the Knicks, who have lacked a consistent playmaker.
lead_paragraph: Jeremy Lin will make the first start of his N.B.A. career Monday night, continuing his fantastic and surprising rise with the Knicks.

headline.main: Knicks' Lin to Make His First N.B.A. Start
